Mini 1422

White Room Mafia
Modded by The Mini-Librarian
Reviewed by petroleumjelly, xRECKONERx and Regfan



You awake in a white room. No Windows. Your vision is a bit hazy; almost like you’re drunk. But you can’t remember anything that happened last night.

That’s when you notice you’re not alone. There’s 13 other people in the room. Most of them are just as disoriented as you are. One isn’t moving.

That’s when you notice the blood on the floor. Not to mention the fact his head isn’t connected his body.

A speaker on the ceiling. “We are among you. We will kill you when the lights go down. Prepare yourselves.”

Rules

Largely stolen from Llama Fluff

[01] VOTING METHOD: Votes must be in bold or in vote tags. example: Vote: LlamaFluff If you do not bold your vote, it will not be counted. You do not have to unvote before casting another vote, but it would be appreciated.

[02] LYNCH: Lynching will require a simple majority of votes. Once a player has reached the necessary majority, any attempts to unvote will be unheeded.

[03] NO LYNCH: You may vote: no lynch – unless it is deadline, majority votes of this kind are necessary to end the day without a death.

[04] DEADLINE: This game will have mandatory deadlines of, at most, 2 weeks. As the game whittles down its living membership deadlines may grow shorter. If I deem it necessary, a player being replaced may necessitate the extension the deadline.

[05] DEADLINE LYNCH RULES: At deadline, a person will be lynched if they have a majority of voters voting for them. That means you can be lynched with just one vote if only one person is voting. If no one has a majority of the votes cast, it is a no-lynch.

[06] NIGHT CHOICES: Night choices will be expected within 48 hours. If you do not inform me of a night choice you will forfeit it.

[07] LURKING AND NOT POSTING: Lurking is not an acceptable strategy in this game. Anyone who goes more than 48 hours without posting, without advance warning, will be prodded. Failure to post in the 48 hours following a prod will result in a player being replaced (Leeway will be given Re: weekends and holidays). Mafia is a social contract. Everyone is expected to give information and comments to be analyzed. If this is uncomfortable for you, consider taking up solitaire instead.

[08] OUT OF THREAD COMMUNICATION: The game is not to be discussed outside the thread unless your role specifically states that you may do so – and then only in the manner stated in your role PM. Don’t quote any out-of-thread communications regarding this game in the thread, this includes role PMs.

[09] BAH POSTS ARE ALLOWED: Once your death scene has been posted, you’re dead. However, since I love Bah posts you may absolutely make one "Bah" post. It should be short and should contain absolutely no game related opinion or information.

[10] TOO CLEVER BY HALF RULE: No small or hidden text or obscure codes. Don’t edit/delete previously submitted posts either. I may retroactively add something to this list, so if you are not sure if something is legal, be safe and ask first. Usually, just use common sense.

[11] VACATION? LIMITED ACCESS? If you anticipate being unavailable for more than a 48-hour period, please post a notice to that effect in this game thread. Treat this game as a commitment. Be considerate – don’t leave us hanging.

[12] FALLIBILITY CLAUSE: Unlike other mods I am fallible. Please point out any mistakes I make gently. In particular, if I post a vote count that does not accurately reflect your vote, it is your responsibility to correct me -- otherwise your vote may be treated as it appears in the vote count.

[13] QUESTIONS: If you have any questions at all, please PM me or post the question in the thread.

[14] GAMBLERS ANON: No bets, deals, promises, etc are allowed. Depending on the severity of one you may be modkilled or forceably replaced.

[15] IF IT QUACKS LIKE A DUCK: If you fake breaking a rule, it will result in the same punishment as actually breaking the rule.

[16] FUN: Remember, it’s a game and it’s supposed to be fun. Be nice to your fellow players and your mod. I have very low tolerance for abusive posts.

[17] I've reserved this color for any purposes I might choose. Don't use it or anything similar to it.

The following is the Vanilla Townie role PM. At least one player in the game received this role.

Hello (player name)

You are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities: You can talk in the game thread and vote.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one pro-town player remains alive.

Game thread is viewtopic.php?f=2&t=25648

Please confirm by pm

"What the hell?" "What's going on here?" "Where are we?" "I'm gonna be sick..."

Confusion reigned supreme for a few minutes. They were going to die, at least that''s what the voice said. There was no reason to not trust it.

One of the prisoners - "Wait a minute the voice there's killers among us. Does that mean in this room?"

More confusion.

Eventually the people agreed on one thing: They would find the liars among them and they would make sure the liars didn't kill them.

The only way to do that was to kill the killers
